comment: Except that so many already eligible cannot even make an appointment. At least not in NJ. Nothing available on any of the myriad sites. It's the Hunger Games of vaccines.
amr:

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (e / except-01

                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1 (m2 / make-01

                              :ARG1-of (q / qualify-02
                                    :time (a / already))
                              :ARG1-of (h / have-quant-91
                                    :ARG2 (m3 / many)
                                    :ARG3 (s / so)))
                        :ARG1 (a2 / appointment-02
                              :ARG0 p2)
                        :mod (e2 / even))))
      :snt2 (b / be-located-at-91
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (n / nothing)
            :ARG2 (s2 / site
                  :mod (a3 / any)
                  :ARG1-of (ii / include-91
                        :ARG2 (s3 / site

            :mod (a4 / at-least))
      :snt3 (g / game
            :name (n2 / name
                  :op1 "The"
                  :op2 "Hunting"
                  :op3 "Games")
            :topic (v / vaccine)))
